datafield.subfield: 18 Syrian pounds for 9 sheets purchased Oct 18 1951.
68 x 57.5 cm. or smaller, on 23 sheets 89 x 69 cm. or smaller.
The Albright library has 2 copies of sheets NI-36 VI (Fiq-Haifa) and NI-36 XVIII (Tripoli).

Sheets: NI-36-VI Fiq-Haifa (1949) -- NI-36-XII Beyrouth (1949) -- NI-36-XVIII Tripoli (1945) -- NI-36-XXIV / NI-37-XIX Lattaquie-Hama (1945) -- NI-37-IX Jebel Tennf (1950) -- NI-37-VIII Sabaa-Biar (1950) -- [NI-37-X] Bir Sejri (1950) -- NI-37-XIII Homs (1949) -- NI-37-XIV Qariateine (2nd ed., 1950) -- NI-37-XV Palmyre (1950) -- NI-37-XVI Ouadi El Miyah (1945) -- NI-37-XVII Abou-Kemal (1950) -- NI-37-XVIII Ana (1950) -- NI-37-XX Selemiye (1st ed., 1945) -- NI-37-XXI Ressafe (1950) -- NI-37-XXII Raqqa (2nd ed., 1950) -- NI-37-XXIII Deir-ez-Zor (1949) -- NI-37-XXIV Bouara (1950) -- NJ-36-VI / NJ-37-I Antakya (Antioche) (2nd ed., 1949) -- NJ-37-II Alep (1949) -- NJ-37-IV Toual Aaba (1950) -- NJ-37-XI-Partie Sud / NJ-37-V Hassetche (1950) -- NJ-37-XII-Partie Sud / NJ-37-VI Qamichliye-Sinjar (1950).
May require conservation work before use.
Graphic key to Albright-held sheets at:

Sheet sizes: NI-37-IX, 89 x 62 cm.; NJ-37-XI/NJ-37-V, 87 x 53 cm.; NI-37-XX, 85 x 57 cm.; NJ-37-XII/NJ-37-VI, 83 x 55 cm.; NI-36-XII, 80 x 56 cm.; NI-36-XXIV/NI-37-XIX, 77 x 67 cm.; NI-37-XXI, NI-37-XXII, NI-37-VIII, NI-37-X, NI-37-XIV, NI-37-XV, NI-37-XVIII, 76 x 56 cm.; NI-37-XVII, 75 x 57 cm.; NJ-37-IV, 75 x 57 cm.; NI-37-XXIV, 75 x 56 cm.; NI-36-XVIII c.1, 73 x 55 cm.; NI-37-XVI, 72 x 56 cm.; NI-36-VI c.1, c.2, 71 x 69 cm.; NI-36-XVIII c.2, NI-37-XIII, NJ-37-II, 71 x 54 cm.; NJ-36-VI/NJ-37-I, 70 x 63 cm.; NI-37-XXIII, 70 x 57 cm.
